name: The secrets of Dyrt

screenshots.caption: Irravonia as a child in the Xenor Bushes
Combat - Eric, Rebecca, Irravonia & Queen Shanda

short_description:
Eric thinks he's no good as his sister Rebecca tops him in everything. When he tries to prove himself he gets noticed by evil guys going to hunt him down. How are you gonna solve that?

This is an oldskool RPG game in old NES/SNES style, but with still some cool new twists. 

Features:
- Turn based battles
- Playable in English and Dutch
- Strong storyline
- 8 playable characters with their own background and unique spells/skills/abilities
- Available for Windows and Mac
- Ability to skip random encounters
- When you come back in an old dungeon you can even turn the encounters off completely.
- Lots of dungeons, bosses and optional bosses


This game is still in development. The game can already be downloaded, however it will still be incomplete and some bugs may pop up on occasion. Please check out my forum http://dyrt.sourceforge.net to see how things are going now.
summary: A fun and challenging RPG game
